title: Thoughts on the new style guide RFC
description: In order to improve Angular’s developer experience, the Angular team recently released a Request for Comments (RFC) that introduces a few significant adjustments to Angular’s style guide, the comprehensive document that details the conventional approaches to naming files, classes, functions, and using certain features.

description: Of course, almost everyone knows about signals today, and has already come up to the realization that they are still a bit... raw. Here is how it ids going to change

title: Why I switched to template-driven forms
description: I used to love reactive forms. Nowadays... not so much. Let's uncover why template-driven forms might be the new best way to handle user input

title: Component Authoring Format
description: Recently, the debate around Angular's component authoring format gained renewed traction again. Let's have a takedown and understand what options exist, and what I think would be the best for the framework we love.

title: Should You Know Javascript Before Learning a Framework
description: One of the forever-raging debates is whether people can learn frameworks vefore properly learning JavaScript. Let's tackle this one!

title: Where is Angular headed
description: With recent developments in the Angular ecosystem, it is now time to review and understand where Angular, and with what approaches does the future of the framework lie.
